entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is trying to avoid detention by telling a convincing story.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is initially skeptical of Harry's story but eventually gives in. She has a 'strangely croaky voice' and is seen blowing her nose.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Harry's friend and companion, who is impressed by Harry's storytelling skills.

entities.name: miss granger
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts who is being visited by Harry. Professor McGonagall gives permission for Harry to visit her.

entities.name: professor binns
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is informed by Professor McGonagall of Harry's whereabouts.

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: The nurse at Hogwarts who is informed by Professor McGonagall that Harry has permission to visit Miss Granger.

entities.name: mandrakes
entities.description: A type of magical plant that is being cared for in the hospital wing. Professor McGonagall mentions that they are 'nearly ready'.

relationships.description: Harry is visiting Professor McGonagall to ask for permission to visit Miss Granger.
Professor McGonagall gives Harry permission to visit Miss Granger.
Professor McGonagall informs Madam Pomfrey that she has given her permission for Harry to visit Miss Granger.
Professor McGonagall informs Professor Binns of Harry's whereabouts.
